original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary: Trump and Zelensky hold critical talks in Anchorage, discussing a potential deal involving territorial exchanges, front line recognition, and international security guarantees. Meanwhile, a Ukrainian man is arrested in Germany for suspected involvement in the 2022 Nord Stream gas pipeline sabotage. In a separate development, Israel begins an operation to take over Gaza City, aiming to achieve full control of the region and defeat Hamas.</s>
